item.title: Astrochemistry
item.description: Astrochemistry (E/A) - Astrochemistry Course Astrochemistry (E/A) Course No. Astrochemistry Category Type Language Teaching hours CP Semester Elective Lecture English 2 4 ST Requirements for Participation: Preparation: Atomic Physics, Molecular Physics and Quantum Mechanics at the level of the bachelor courses in physics, Molecular Physics I Form of Testing and Examination: Oral Examination Length of Course: 1 semester Aims of the Course: The lecture introduces to astrochemistry of various astrophysical environments.
